#if 1
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
#include<utility>
#include<set>
#include<cassert>
#include<vector>
#include<string>
#include<string.h>
#include<map>
#include<set>
#include<string.h>
#include<fstream>
#include<queue>
#include<stack>
#include<sstream>
#include <fstream>
using namespace std;

#ifndef WIN32
#define ONLINE_JUDGE
#endif

#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
#define gc() getc(stdin)
#else
#define gc getchar_unlocked
#endif

typedef  long long ull;
#define FOR(i,a,b) for(int i=a;i<b;++i)
#define FORI(i,a,b) for(int i=a;i<=b;++i)

#define REP(i,a) for(int i=0;i<a;++i)
#define REPI(i,a) for(int i=0;i<=a;++i)


ull DTUVirat()
{
	ull prd = 1;
	int n; cin>> n;
	vector<ull> arr(n);		
	REP(i,n) 
	{
		cin>> arr[i];	
	}
	sort(arr.begin(),arr.end());
	int m = 0;
	bool negative = false;
	for(;arr[m]<0;++m)
	{
		negative = true;
		prd=prd*arr[m];
	}
	if(negative && prd> 0)
	{
		prd/=arr[m-1];
	}
	if(!negative)  return arr[0];
	for(int i=m;i<n;++i)
	{
		if(arr[i]!=0) prd*=arr[i];
	}	
	return prd;	
}



int main()
{
#ifdef WIN32
	 freopen("D:\\inout\\inout.txt","r",stdin);
#endif
   int T;    
   {
	   cout<<DTUVirat()<<endl;
   }
    return 0;
}

#endif
